experiences.name: Fiksu
bullets: Developed applications from backend to front in Ruby on Rails hosted on Amazon Web Services (AWS).
Built robust software to withstand the computing and storage demands of big data.
Wrote stateless programs that take advantage of cloud computing by scaling the number and size of server instances seamlessly.
Leveraged automated testing (RSpec) to deliver a well-tested product with high confidence and maximum efficiency.
Worked in an Agile software development team, enabling high adaptability and flexible release schedules.
Managed a cross-team project by designing system architecture in collaboration with colleagues, writing technical specs and delegating tasks.

experiences.name: GE Healthcare
bullets: Optimized a parallel-processing Fast Fourier Transform (FFT) implementation using OpenCL language, improving upon existing optimizations by speed-ups of over 18%.
Designed and executed performance benchmarking methodology for AMD parallel computing platforms.
Identified, investigated, and resolved bugs in alpha firmware and software.
Cooperated with internationally-based engineers to jointly achieve project performance objectives.
